description: This file declares the DobbySpecGenerator class responsible for generating container specifications in JSON format based on application and runtime configurations. It includes methods to create environment variables, mounts, plugins, and various configuration-related JSON structures. The class interfaces with other components via external includes and references specific configurations and runtime parameters.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating container specifications and configurations in JSON format based on application and runtime parameters.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates a JSON string representing the container specification based on provided application configuration and runtime configuration.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates JSON environment variables configuration from application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates JSON mounts configuration from application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates JSON RDK plugins configuration from application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for the minidump plugin.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for the Application Service SDK plugin.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for the network plugin.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates JSON for a bind mount with specified source, destination, and options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines if GPU should be enabled based on configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates system memory limit for the container.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates GPU memory limit for the container.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) is enabled in configuration.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Retrieves CPU core information.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates JSON with classic plugin configurations.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for Ethan log plugin.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for multicast socket plugin.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for Ion memory plugin.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for Thunder plugin.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON configuration for OpenCDM plugin.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates JSON for private data mount.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates JSON for Fkps mounts.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates JSON for tmpfs mount.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates JSON for resource manager mount.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Gets the working directory JSON configuration.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps JSON configuration.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes URL strings for use in JSON configuration.
